name: TestsForPseudomonasAeruginosaByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Tests for Pseudomonas aeruginosa by Culture and Identification Method
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Pseudomonas aeruginosa by Culture and Identification Method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Pseudomonas aeruginosa by Culture and Identification Method),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
